A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved how different this movie was! The over-arching theme of the folly of ego and learning from failures was interesting and made it so that I had no way of expecting what was going to happen next. The brash scoundrel doesn't always win??? Craziness. I loved it. It showed that even the heroes can mess up sometimes\, even Luke\, because they are all just human. Or alien. You know what I mean.
